title: Wrong Bed, Right Guy - Novel Updates
tags: Adultery   Affair   Aggressive Characters   Arranged Marriage   Arrogant Characters   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Bickering Couple   Blackmail   Cheats   Clingy Lover   Cohabitation   Contracts   Female Protagonist   Pregnancy   Unconditional Love   Unrequited Love
author: ELF Lemon   柠檬精
description:
Ling Xinyue’s fiance is a big jerk! Seducing her adopted sister, scheming her property…  

So she slept with a stranger in a pet!

A few months later, while she’s pregnant, the gossip of Mu’s secret fiancee spread everywhere. 

Misfortunes never come singly, her father was drugged and sent to the hospital. Everything in her family was about to be taken away by bit*h couple. 

In desperation, she had to be cheeky and asked Mu for help… 

By the time that dust settled, she was forced to stay with Mu. 

“Just remember, it all started with you…  For you, it’s over. For me, it’s not!” 

“Fine, the child belongs to you! Let’s call it even!” She resisted furiously. 

“But how about the marriage contract you owe me?” Mu said with a smile.>
